Translations.Text: – Nirjivavagidda nadannu a mulaka jivantagolisalikkagi mattu navu srstisiruva halavaru januvarugalige mattu manavarige kudisalikkagi
avaru pathakaliyalendu, navu adannu avara naduve hanci bidutteve. Adare heccina manavaru krtaghnare agiruttare
navu bayasiddare pratiyondu nadigu obba eccarisuvatanannu kalisuttiddevu
nivu dhikkarigala ajneyannu palisabedi. Avara virud'dha horata nadesiri – maha horata
avane eradu kadalugalannu jodisidavanu. Idu, hitakaravada sihi niru mattu idu, rucigetta uppu niru. Avanu averadara naduve tereyannu hagu bahala balisthavada ondu tadeyannu nirmisiruvanu
avane nirininda manavanannu srstisidavanu mattu avanige rakta sambandhavannu vivaha sambandhavannu odagisidavanu. Nim'modeyanu samarthanu
avaru allahanannu bittu, tamage yavude labhavannagali nastavannagali madalagada vastugalannu pujisuttare. Mattu dhikkariyu tanna naija odeyana virodhiyagiddane
(dutare,) navu nim'mannu subhavarte niduvavaragi hagu eccarisuvavaragi kaluhisiruvevu
heliri; nanu idakkagi nim'minda yavude pratiphalavannu beduttilla. Ista ullavanu tanna odeyana kadegiruva dariyannu svikarisali
endu sayada, sada jivantaviruvavanalli bharavase idiri mattu avanannu hogalutta avana pavitravannu japisiri. Tanna dasara papagalannu ariyalu avane saku
avane, akasagalannu, bhumiyannu mattu avugala naduve iruva ellavannu aru dinagalalli srstisi a balika visva sinhasanadalli sthapitanadavanu. Avanu parama dayalu. Avana kuritu, ballavarannu keliri

A parama dayaluvige sastangaveragiri endu avarodane helidaga avaru parama dayamayanendare enu? Navenu, ninu adesisidavarige sastangaveragabeke? Ennuttare. Hige, idu (i kareyu) avara jigupseyannaste heccisitu
akasadalli bhadrakotegalannu (naksatragalannu) nirmisidavanu mattu adaralli suryanannu ujvala candranannu nirmisidavanu tumba samrd'dhanu
ista ullavanu upadesa svikarisali athava ista ullavanu krtajnanagalendu, ratri hagalugalannu parasparara himbalakaragisidavanu, avane
a parama dayaluvina (nistha) dasaru bhumiyalli vinayada nadige nadeyuttare mattu tam'modane ajnanigalu matigilidare avaru,‘salam’ endaste heluttare
avaru ratriyannu tam'ma odeyanige sastanga veraguttalu nilluttalu (namajh‌nalli) kaleyuttare
